msgSnippet: Hi, I recently added the tag that creates reports in XML and text format for generating junitreports.  Unfortunately, our tests hang when we do that with the

Hi,

I recently added the tag that creates reports in XML and text format 
for generating junitreports.  Unfortunately, our tests hang when we 
do that with the following error.  

Has anyone else run into this?  I'd appreciate any feedback I can get 
on this.

sb
